LanguageData.Arsenal_ConfigureHubsDesc: Set stock limits for HUB staging platforms. The ARSENAL will automatically manufacture and deliver missiles to maintain these levels.
LanguageData.Arsenal_ConfigureDesc: Configure which HUBs this ARSENAL should supply and their stock limits.
LanguageData.Arsenal_NoHubsAvailable: No HUBs available on the world map.
LanguageData.Arsenal_NoHubAvailable: Missile manufactured but no HUB available for delivery.
LanguageData.Arsenal_LaunchStrikeDesc: Launch a cruise missile at a target within {0} tiles.
LanguageData.Arsenal_EjectMissileDesc: Remove a missile from storage and place it on the ground.
LanguageData.Arsenal_TargetOutOfRange: Target is out of range (max {0} tiles).
LanguageData.Arsenal_InsufficientFuel: Missile has insufficient fuel for this range.
LanguageData.Arsenal_InsufficientHops: Warning: Insufficient HOP coverage for route. Missile may not reach destination.
